thread.title: Statement from Henry L. Meyer III, non-executive Chairman of the Board -- United Continental Holdings
thread.title_full: Statement from Henry L. Meyer III, non-executive Chairman of the Board -- United Continental Holdings - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Statement from Henry L. Meyer III, non-executive Chairman of the Board -- United Continental Holdings
text:
United Airlines
CHICAGO , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- "The Company anticipates it will today conclude the corporate governance process necessitated by the hospitalization of President and CEO, Oscar Munoz . The company expects to release more details either later today or tomorrow. In the meantime, the United family's thoughts and well-wishes are with Oscar," said Henry L. Meyer III , non-executive Chairman of the Board.
